message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you at $950,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. That's a bit high for my budget. I'd be willing to pay $700,000 for this product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. Based on our evaluation, we are willing to consider your offer at $825,000.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. To be honest, $800,000 is the absolute highest I can go. If you're willing to meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
